translations: v．训斥，责备：对某人的行为或言论表示不满或不赞同，通常是出于对方违反规定或道德原则。
· The teacher was reprimanding the student for being late.
老师正在责备学生迟到。

sentences.sentence: The second type of reproacher is the thoroughgoing scolder, who never lets up reprimanding the lover.
sentences.translation: 第二种责难者是彻头彻尾的责难者，他从不松懈谴责情人。

sentences.sentence: Reprimanding your puppy will not stop him from biting.
sentences.translation: 谴责你的小狗，会不会停止他的咬噬。

sentences.sentence: The corporation promoted the latter while reprimanding the former!
sentences.translation: 这家公司提拔了后者，训斥了前者！
